Birds Open Source

The aim of this project is to help low-budget teams in non-space faring nations by providing a more solid basis for satellite development. We know from experience that starting from scratch is too much work.

Front Access Board

The application executable file can be found in the following directory:

<root>/BIRDS-GS_software/OpenBirdsOperation/OpenBirdsOperation/bin/Debug/Open Birds Operation.exe

Compatibility with GNU/Linux is untested.

The repository for the Open Birds Operation (Ground Station) Software can be found here.

Note: software is untested by repository authors.
